install.name: AMC Slideshow
install.author: Anthony McLin
install.description: This module provides a Javascript-based slideshow. It requires the template to include Mootools 1.2 and the Clientcide library

param.name: randomize
param.label: Randomize
param.description: Randomize the display order on page load. If no is selected images will be displayed alphabetically.

param.name: timed
param.label: Timed
param.description: Select whether the slideshow does timed auto-advances.

param.name: delay
param.label: Delay
param.description: Set the time delay between images in miliseconds.

param.name: type
param.label: Image Type
param.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (default is JPG)

param.name: subfolders
param.label: Include SubFolders
param.description: Check on if you wish subdirectories to be included in the slideshow.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
